programme.title: Employment in America
programme.short_synopsis: The cancellation of Labor Day in New York City, and an examination of US workers.
programme.medium_synopsis: Employment in America, and attempts to define the modern working population are discussed by Cooke, following the cancellation of the Labor Day parade in New York.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
